name: Remainers
description:
The world is threatened by dangerous biological forces and experiments. The Remainer and his team take it upon themselves to investigate the suspected front gates of the shrine of the DemonWood forests.                                      

THE GAME  CONTAINS:
  1. Story mode 
  2. Survival mode 
UPCOMING UPDATES:  Support Blaster Studio for the upcoming
  • New weapons 
  • New enemies
  • Story mode  progress

The game is under development, if you encounter any  bug or problem with the game,  please contact us.                                           

 Don't forget to leave a review / comment, your interaction supports us.

BLASTER GAMES STUDIO

This is our new studio's first (demo) game, made by pygame. Hope we give you good gothic gaming vibes.
